attributes.action: Stop the Government removing the PSED
attributes.additional_details:
First they came for the Equality Act
and I didn't speak out because I thought it would not affect me
Then they came for the Equality Act Campaigners,
and I didn't speak out because I wasn't affected by any equality issues.
Then they came for the teachers and managers that promoted equality, tackled discrimination and fostered good relationships between diverse groups,
and I didn't speak out because I wasn't a teacher/manager.
Then they came for me,
and there was no one left to speak for me.

Equality, Diversity and Inclusion – it matters to us all
Sign the petition to stop the Government weakening the Public Sector Equality Duties

rejection.details: Please re-submit - not entirely clear yet what reply the the Government can give?
